ing: 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, partially drained
des: "This is really good, and so easy - no cooking required and no fancy spices. Mix ingredients in a bowl and serve with your favorite crackers. If sweet onions are not available and your onion is strong, add only half at first and then add more to taste."
ins: Combine Neufchatel cheese, pineapple, Cheddar cheese, and sweet onion in a bowl; smash with a fork until blended.
